TopicTitle: Target tracking icon? info bar thingy

Articles.Content: hey gentlemen im having an issue when trying to do rescue missions or during docking. ive got the target set as target but when im coming into said target its not highlighted so finding it is literally a shot in the dark. i am managing to complete the missions with the navball but would really like the help of this visual aid.  is it a setting somewhere i have to turn on? ive searched but cant find anything. recently came into the light from console but there it was just always on i guess. any help on the subject would be greatly appreciated
You can enable/disable target highlighting with F4.
well dont i feel dumb toggle ship labels. its right there in the controls. i looked through them multiple times and somehow never clued in that it was a ship label..... thank you
Don't feel too bad.  The same thing happened to me. I must have fat fingered the F5.  It took me a week until I figured out what was going on.
And always puts lights /batteries around your docking ports
